texts.name: Sister Elisa
texts.biography: As a sacred priest, Sister Elisa used to be a companion of King Roland. After the battle of Ironfist, she started to show her interest in dark power. Now she no longer follows the King Roland and persue a new identification, as an assassin.

specialty.description:
{Wind Dancers}

Increases Speed of any Wind Dancers or Shadow Dancers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 2 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Wind Dancers
